name: The Black Swan and The Gold Fish
description:
In our society today, we are experiencing a black swan in Covid19. This event took the world by surprise and led to financial collapse and millions lost jobs.

However, most people are not aware that an even greater threat is about to happen. The real black swan is the rampant ‘social addiction’ sweeping over the world.

Humans have a shorter attention span than a goldfish according to a study. Humans are depicted as goldfish in this painting, like a goldfish, we can feel the black swan, we can sense it but like a goldfish we just go with the flow, don't give a fuck and don’t pay attention.

This piece titled  “The Black Swan & The Goldfish" is created to raise public awareness on social addiction and its devastating effects on our mental health and to the society at large.
